column4: SO I did a fresh install of Gutsy, I got my mouse back under Software but there is lots of graphic distortion and graphics disappearing.  Any ideas?
restart, if the problem persists, disable the eyecandy
and how would I go about that?
much better
worked?
yup it's going fine, in fact it was near immediate
alright so next deal, how do I fix this to get those neat effects up and running properly?
unless it was default no
alright done
you want gnome-compiz-manager
and it's installed via synaptic 8)
I love a good fight 8) ??
alright got it and it did exactly as you said 8)
i've contended with it on three different installs
anything special I should do with this?
nope just the alpha layer
sorry the transparency
it's doing this wierd thing where my desktop receeds
goes back a bit visually
and I am getting like a duel theme thing going on, ala one plain theme, and partial button skin
I am just going to disable GL Desktop
